data.name: Modelling.Properties
data.label: Modelling Mode
data.info: In the modelling mode you can change dimensions or features of objects

data.name: Accumulating.Faces
data.label: Accumulating faces
data.info: In accumulation mode, you can add more faces to the collection and do something with the collection as a whole

data.name: Accumulating.Faces.List
data.label: List of faces ({0})
data.info: List of already accumulated faces

data.name: MenuId.GeneralModifications
data.label: General modifications of this object
data.info: Move, rotate, reflect, scale, copy or delete this object

data.name: Mate.Mode
data.label: Orientation
data.info: Mate from inside or outside

data.name: Mate.Target
data.label: Target face
data.info: Face onto which will be mated

data.name: MenuId.Edge
data.label: Edge
data.info: submenu for the edge

data.name: MenuId.Face
data.label: Face
data.info: submenu for the face

data.name: MenuId.Shell
data.label: Shell
data.info: submenu for the shell

data.name: MenuId.Solid
data.label: Solid
data.info: submenu for the solid

data.name: MenuId.Solid.RemoveFrom
data.label: Subtract from Solid (Specify)
data.info: This solid will be subtracted from another solid you will specify in the next step

data.name: MenuId.Solid.RemoveFromAll
data.label: Subtract from Overlapping
data.info: Subtracts this solid from all overlapping or intersecting solids

data.name: MenuId.Solid.RemoveAll
data.label: Subtract Overlapping
data.info: Subtracts all overlapping or intersecting solids from this solid

data.name: MenuId.Solid.UniteWithAll
data.label: Unite with overlapping
data.info: Unites this solid with all overlapping or intersecting solids into a single body

data.name: MenuId.Solid.IntersectWith
data.label: Intersect with Solid (Specify)
data.info: Creates a new solid from the overlapping volume of this solid another solid to be specified

data.name: MenuId.Solid.IntersectWith
data.label: Intersect with Overlapping
data.info: Creates a new solid from the overlapping volume of this solid and all intersecting solids

data.name: MenuId.Solid.SplitWith
data.label: Split with Solid (Specify)
data.info: Splits this solids with a solid to specify into separate parts, creating individual bodies for the overlapping and non-overlapping regions

data.name: MenuId.Solid.SplitWithAll
data.label: Split with overlapping
data.info: Splits intersecting solids into separate parts, creating individual bodies for the overlapping and non-overlapping regions

data.name: MenuId.Parametrics.Cylinder.Radius
data.label: Change radius
data.info: Change radius of cylindrical features

data.name: MenuId.Parametrics.Cylinder.Diameter
data.label: Change radius
data.info: Change radius of cylindrical features

data.name: Constr.Parametrics.Cylinder.Radius
data.label: Change radius
data.info: Change radius of cylindrical features

data.name: Constr.Parametrics.Cylinder.Diameter
data.label: Change diameter
data.info: Change diameter of cylindrical features

data.name: Parametrics.Cylinder.Radius
data.label: Radius
data.info: Change radius of this feature

data.name: Parametrics.Cylinder.Diameter
data.label: Diameter
data.info: Change diameter of this feature

data.name: Parametrics.AssociateParametric
data.label: Use as parameter for the solid

data.name: Parametrics.AssociateParametric
data.label: Use as parameter for the solid

data.name: Parametrics.ParametricsName
data.label: Name
data.info: Name for the parameter. If provided, this will be a property of the solid

data.name: Parametrics.PreserveValue
data.label: Preserve Value
data.info: If enabled, the parameter's value will remain unchanged when other parameters of the solid are modified

data.name: MenuId.ParametricProperty.Preserve
data.label: Preserve Value
data.info: If enabled, the parameter's value will remain unchanged when other parameters of the solid are modified
